Title: Crazy for Milo
Plot: Gibbs and Tyler test a lie-detector application, only to have their own hard truths revealed. Elsewhere, Amy and Neal dabble in role-playing games; and Milo's ideal woman turns out to be a bit too eccentric.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Meredith Hagner, Mircea Monroe, Tauvia Dawn, Kevin Grant Spencer, Wilmer Valderrama
